summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9528 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14936 lux), cloud levels (up 1905 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 325.7m lower than yesterday, 829.4m lower than the past week, 1905.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 741.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1570.6m and 2650m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Some rain can be expected, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and low sunlight due to cloudy or overcast skies. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
